name: null literal equals null literal
input: null == null

name: null literal not equals null literal
input: null != null

name: String null value equals null literal
input: variable x: String; return x == null;

name: Number null value equals null literal
input: variable x: Number; return x == null;

name: Boolean null value equals null literal
input: variable x: Boolean; return x == null;

name: NumberWithUnit null value equals null literal
input: variable x: NumberWithUnit; return x == null;

name: Color null value equals null literal
input: variable x: Color; return x == null;

name: Color.Hex null value equals null literal
input: variable x: Color.Hex; return x == null;

name: String with value not equals null literal
input: variable x: String = "hello"; return x == null;

name: Number with value not equals null literal
input: variable x: Number = 42; return x == null;

name: Boolean with value not equals null literal
input: variable x: Boolean = true; return x == null;

name: NumberWithUnit with value not equals null literal
input: variable x: NumberWithUnit = 10px; return x == null;

name: Color with value not equals null literal
input: variable x: Color = #ff0000; return x == null;

name: empty List not equals null literal
input: variable x: List; return x == null;

name: List with elements not equals null literal
input: variable x: List = 1, 2, 3; return x == null;

name: empty Dictionary not equals null literal
input: variable x: Dictionary; return x == null;

name: Dictionary with values not equals null literal
input: variable dict: Dictionary; dict.set("key", "value"); return dict == null;

name: String null value not equals null literal
input: variable x: String; return x != null;

name: String with value not equals null literal
input: variable x: String = "hello"; return x != null;

name: empty List not equals null literal
input: variable x: List; return x != null;

name: empty Dictionary not equals null literal
input: variable x: Dictionary; return x != null;

name: null from dictionary method equals null literal
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable value: String = dict.get("nonexistent"); return value == null;

name: multiple null comparisons in expression
input: variable a: String; variable b: Number; variable c: List; return (a == null) && (b == null) && (c != null);

name: null comparison in if statement condition true
input: variable a: String; if (a == null) [ return "is null"; ] else [ return "not null"; ];

name: null comparison in if statement condition false
input: variable a: String = "hello"; if (a == null) [ return "is null"; ] else [ return "not null"; ];
